title: Sculpture: process of discovery
brief_description: As sculptor Norm Hines searches for the shape he says is hidden in a rock, he discusses his approach to creativity. He has no preconceived form - the shape is decided as it happens.
description: As sculptor Norm Hines searches for the shape he says is hidden in a rock, he discusses his approach to creativity. He has no preconceived form - the shape is decided as it happens.
